newcaseconfirm.title: Successful Report Submission
newcaseconfirm.description: The report has been submitted with the following details:
newcaseconfirm.warning: ATTENTION! You may be asked for additional information or clarifications through the platform. Please save these details so you can track the progress of the case. If you lose them, you will not be able to retrieve them again.
newcaseconfirm.confirmButton: I confirm that I have saved them
newcaseconfirm.thankYou: Thank you! You can track the progress of the case at

newmessageconfirm.title: New message sent
newmessageconfirm.description: Thank you! Case {{whistle.id}} has been updated with the new message.

welcome.message: Welcome to the anonymous reporting service for Code of Ethics violations of your organization. The service is provided by Computer Studio S.A.
